column5: Report? Seriously, I want everyone to be able to what is written. I shouldn't be the only one who gets a laugh.  Your ideas on yearly elections is another nugget that needs to be seen. Just as I thought. More drivel.
The master of irony. I bow at your presents.

The master of irony. I bow at your presents.  I think you meant presence? But, I could be wrong if he hands out some awesome presents for christmas  Moxie does have a very valid point about the lieberals making a mess of Ontario. There are plenty of examples to support this.
Moxie does have a very valid point about the lieberals making a mess of Ontario. There are plenty of examples to support this.  Name me a political party that hasn't

Name me a political party that hasn't  Pretty much... You're damned if you do and damned if you don't.   Anyone who thinks there's a party out there that will magically turn all this around is out to lunch.

Pretty much... You're damned if you do and damned if you don't.   Anyone who thinks there's a party out there that will magically turn all this around is out to lunch.  Wife and I were just talking about this last night while listening to the 3 party leaders talking.  I've hated the liberals from day one and have always voted against them, but looking at our choices sure doesn't make things any easier.
It was underlined for a reason. A little word play.

Wife and I were just talking about this last night while listening to the 3 party leaders talking.  I've hated the liberals from day one and have always voted against them, but looking at our choices sure doesn't make things any easier.  It would be nice if there was an easy choice, but unfortunately there isn't.
Yup, not much to choose from. I think if anyone wants change, they should move from Ontario.
never thought it would turn into a political debate. geez guys. go fishing
Ya just gotta keep switching them up so they don't get too comfortable...thats when they screw us.  Plus, its takes 2 terms to get a pension...just don't vote for the same one twice
Anyone notice an increase in plate tags this year? Just looked at mine. Car went from $75 - $90. Truck $135 - $197  Friggin' ridiculous.
Yep.  North of Parry Sound is still about half the price though
What kind of truck are you driving? Did my F150 in December.. Commercial Plate... $90 and that was up a few dollars from the year previous.
Yep. North of Parry Sound is still about half the price though I'm headed that way end of the week and need my sticker...
What percentage of your income is tax? Why does the percentage keep increasing? Does the increase get me something I was not getting before?

What percentage of your income is tax? Why does the percentage keep increasing? Does the increase get me something I was not getting before?  Ummm I ask the same about the percentage of increase from speculation on real estate and fuel, which in turn cause everything we buy to cost us more for less.  As for the cash grab at the MTO, I know about 20,000 pot holes on my commute to work where they could spend some of the increase LOL
Yup, gotta get mine this week, $90 bucks for the Jeep Liberty. Wanna pay less taxes , retire, more deductions, income splitting is great  , and the gas/tax you save going to work is monumental.
Wanna pay less taxes , retire, more deductions, income splitting is great  , and the gas/tax you save going to work is monumental.  Yup, and every day is Saturday morning
Yup, and every day is Saturday morning What's your address?  I'm sending over the Jehovah crew...
What's your address?  I'm sending over the Jehovah crew...  They stopped by 4 years ago but after hearing my opinion of them, they never came back
They stopped by 4 years ago but after hearing my opinion of them, they never came back  I think it's your gnarly smile that did them in, Lew.
Awesome thread it reminds me I needed a sticker as of yesterday Doh!!!!

Misspending and public sector pensions and perks ain't cheap you know. With an election looming I"m hoping everyone will remember what those corrupt lieberal mongrels have done to our great province for the last decade.   Edited because I was not allowed to use one of my favorite words to describe lieberals so Mongrels will have to suffice.
Yep, the new minority government will sure fix the messes of the old minority government.  Edit to add: And surely our plate fees will come down the day after the election.
What kind of truck are you driving? Did my F150 in December.. Commercial Plate... $90 and that was up a few dollars from the year previous. 2008 Sierra 2500 Duramax

Yep, the new minority government will sure fix the messes of the old minority government.  Edit to add: And surely our plate fees will come down the day after the election. Wow!  That a boy Rob. Throw in the towel. That's the spirit!!!
Come on show me your stones. I worry about stuff that can be fixed.
Nice job editing. Cause nothing says passive aggressive like suggesting you've got something else to say but won't/can't so as not to cause the mods a headache.

No one likes to pay more for something. But it is more then a stretch to then turn that into getting rid of one minority government to magically fix the issues.  We need to move beyond the this party is bad therefore this party is good.

on a lighter note,    They stopped by 4 years ago but after hearing my opinion of them, they never came back  I'm pretty sure if Lew got in my face, I'd say "Sorry Sir" and get the heck out of there too

Wayne....think the increase was recent.  my bday is feb 18 and for first time in my life went to service ontario early to renew (january maybe) and the the lady at the kiosk suggested I renew for two years when I said i only wanted one year....she said buy two years  because prices were going up soon.  I took her advice.  ????

Anyone notice an increase in plate tags this year? Just looked at mine. Car went from $75 - $90. Truck $135 - $197  Friggin' ridiculous. Don't wanna do this Newf but "WHY YOU COMPLAINING NOW?!?!?! THIS IS OLD NEWS!!!!! WHINE TO SOMEONE THAT CARES!!!!!!!  Come on show me your stones. I worry about stuff that can be fixed.  Dear nitpicking frog. No matter how small I can assure you I'm doing my part. I'd be very interested in knowing what if any action you have taken. Nice job editing. Cause nothing says passive aggressive like suggesting you've got something else to say but won't/can't so as not to cause the mods a headache. The real whiners click the "Report" icon when dey feewings is hurt so draw someone else into your mind numbing web of  No one likes to pay more for something. But it is more then a stretch to then turn that into getting rid of one minority government to magically fix the issues.  We need to move beyond the this party is bad therefore this party is good     Pointing out the obvious there rob. I never said it would fix the issues. I simply said I hope people remember at election time what this government has done. Unless we stand up together this will not end but until then we keep booting them in their a$$es. I'd rather have them running around exhausting all angles and scenarios on how to keep getting elected and instead focus on making the right decisions for everyone. Yearly elections? Thats a dime I don't mind paying. Wouldn't you rather they threw in the towel rob?
Report? Seriously, I want everyone to be able to what is written. I shouldn't be the only one who gets a laugh.  Your ideas on yearly elections is another nugget that needs to be seen.
on a lighter note,    I'm pretty sure if Lew got in my face, I'd say "Sorry Sir" and get the heck out of there too  HAHAHA, thanks for the early morning laugh Chris
2008 Sierra 2500 Duramax  My buddy called me last week to ask what my renewal was becasue his went up bigtime. They had his truck list at over 3000kg and that was the reason he was told it went up.
